member.name: FILE_LEVEL_TRIM
member.summary: Used as input to theFSCTL_FILE_LEVEL_TRIM control code.

member.name: FILE_LEVEL_TRIM.NumRanges
member.summary: Number of entries in the Ranges member. On return should be compared with theNumRangesProcessed member of the structure.

member.name: FILE_LEVEL_TRIM.Ranges
member.summary: Array of ranges that describe the portions of the file that are to be trimmed.
